summary: Hyperscalers are aggressively increasing AI-related capex for 2024/2025 (Microsoft: ~$50B, Google: $49B, Meta: $35-40B, AWS: doubling data center spend). GPU rental prices remain elevated at $3.14/hr, indicating sustained demand pressure. Rumors of GPT-5 (Q3/Q4 2024) and Gemini 2 further drive bullish sentiment.
